head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EXTRACT, LON C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EXTRACT, LON C.

block.p: EXTRACT-Lon C. Beloved husband of Lollie. Devoted father of Jonathan and Amber. Cherished son of Howard Extract and Florence Kassler. Loving brother of Michelle and Mark Shimel. Dear uncle of Alex and Spencer. Services Sunday 10AM at ''Riverside-Nassau North Chapels'', 55 North Station Plaza (opposite LIRR), Great Neck, NY.
